caption: Figure 2: Comparison with Attention Drop under the same skipping ratios.
description: The chart compares the performance of MindSkip against Attention Drop under different skipping ratios (12.5% and 25%) on a specific benchmark, highlighting MindSkip's superior performance.

caption: Figure 3: Effectiveness across language models.
description: The chart displays the performance of MindSkip across different numbers of MindSkip layers for Mistral-7B and Qwen2.5-7B language models.
